SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into user_logins (`uid`, register_ip, last_login_ip, register_time, last_login_time) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{registerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user_logins set `uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, register_ip = #{registerIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, register_time = #{registerTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, `uid`, register_ip, last_login_ip, register_time, last_login_time from user_logins
